${modID}:Vigor.NAME: Vigor
DESCRIPTION: For the remaining light will be your shield against the dark.

${modID}:Lightspeed.NAME: Lightspeed
DESCRIPTION: Draw a card, draw #b1 less card next turn.

${modID}:Infusion.NAME: Infusion
DESCRIPTION: NL #yBreak : Increase the damage of the card that created this by #b

${modID}:Flame.NAME: Sealed : Incendiary Flow
DESCRIPTION: After you discard a Status or Primal if Incendiary Flow is in your hand, Cycle it, otherwise deal #b

${modID}:CrystalSlot.NAME: Crystal Orb Slot
DESCRIPTION: An orb can be channeled into this slot. when an Orb is removed from this slot this slot is removed.

${modID}:HailSlot.NAME: Hail Orb Slot
DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, an orb channeled into this orb slot deals damage equal to its passive amount to a random enemy twice. when an Orb is removed from this slot this slot is removed.

${modID}:Sleet.NAME: Sleet
DESCRIPTION: #yPassive : at the end of your turn apply #b

and evoke your next orb if its an icicle.

${modID}:Dawn.NAME: Dawn
DESCRIPTION: When you play a skill, if the last card played was a different type, gain #b4 [${modID}:BlockIcon] .

${modID}:Dusk.NAME: Dusk
DESCRIPTION: When you draw a card during your turn, deal #b2 damage to a random enemy.
